name: FButtonStyle
doc: Represents the appearance of an SButton

Normal: Button appearance when the button is not hovered or pressed
Disabled: Button appearance when disabled, by default this is set to an invalid resource when that is the case default disabled drawing is used.
NormalForeground: Foreground Color when the button is not hovered or pressed
NormalPadding:
Padding that accounts for the border in the button's background image.
When this is applied, the content of the button should appear flush
with the button's border. Use this padding when the button is not pressed.
PressedPadding:
Same as NormalPadding but used when the button is pressed. Allows for moving the content to match
any "movement" in the button's border image.
PressedSlateSound: The sound the button should play when pressed
HoveredSlateSound: The sound the button should play when initially hovered over
